definition: to rock one's body backward and forward/to be convulsed (with laughter etc)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on

sentences.english: The feeling you get when a group of friends all laugh really hard at one of your random jokes.
sentences.chinese: 隨便說了個笑話就把身邊的朋友逗得前俯後仰。

sentences.english: When I told Mother what the boys had done, she laughed herself into a state of helplessness.
sentences.chinese: 當我把男孩們乾的事告訴母親時，她笑得前俯後仰。

sentences.english: The audience was rocking with laughter.
